meanings.definition: Of or relating to a single molecule.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the monomeric structure of the molecule.
meanings.sent2: The monomeric compound was found to be highly stable.
meanings.sent3: The monomeric molecule decided to go solo and not bond with others.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a monomeric molecule, unique and independent.
meanings.sent5: The monomeric nature of the substance made it stand out in the experiment.

meanings.definition: Consisting of a single unit or component.
meanings.sent1: The toy was made of a monomeric piece that could not be separated.
meanings.sent2: The monomeric design of the building made it easy to assemble.
meanings.sent3: The monomeric puzzle piece was the key to solving the mystery.
meanings.sent4: His monomeric approach to problem-solving simplified the task.
meanings.sent5: The monomeric structure of the vehicle ensured its durability.
